Introduction

Eunkwang is a South Korean singer, songwriter, TV personality, and musical actor under BTOB Company. He is best known for being the leader and main vocalist of the boy group BTOB and its sub-unit BTOB-Blue. He eventually made his solo debut on June 8, 2020 with the mini album FoRest: Entrance.

Eunkwang debuted as the leader of BTOB on March 21, 2012 with the digital single "Insane".

In August 2018, Eunkwang enlisted in the military. He was released in April 7, 2020.
